alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 4:55PM CDT until August 15 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Shelby County in central Alabama... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 455 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Columbiana, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Calera, Columbiana, Wilsonville, Lay Lake, Shelby, Bounds Lake, Beeswax Creek Park, Alabama 4H Center, Shelby Shores, Highway 145 and CR 46, Spring Creek and Kelley Branch. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
